name: RI_1_1_Record_Lifecycle
title: RI.1.1 Record Lifecycle (Function)
purpose:
References:
- ISO 21089: Health Informatics 
- Trusted End-to-End Information Flows
- HL7 EHR Interoperability Model DSTU
- HL7 Electronic Health Record Lifecycle Model DSTU

statement.label: RI.1.1#01
statement.requirement: The system SHALL conform to function [[RI.1.2.1]] (Manage Record Entries) as the final step to conclude each Record Lifecycle Event in [[RI.1.1]] (Record Lifecycle) and all child functions.
